text: This was my first exposure to the N64! I was hanging out at a friend's house in the basement den while the adults chatted upstairs. Someone fired up this game on a then-giant rear projection TV and I didn't pay much attention until this stage popped up and then I was just amazed. Everything felt so huge, wide-open and exciting! I didn't play Mario 64 myself until I was in high school and of course by then it had lost some of its magic. But the memory remains and it's a good reminder that sometimes it's good to drop the adult facade, take in the sights, and just enjoy some adventure! Wah-hoo... waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
